text: Edgar Kaminskyi (Ukrainian: Едгар Камінський; born 27 February 1985) is a Ukrainian plastic surgeon, founder of Kaminskyi Clinic and Kaminskyi HUB, organizer and patron of the Ukrainian Medical Festival and speaker of medical conferences. == Biography == Edgar Kaminsky was born on February 27, 1985 in Rivne (Ukraine). In 2002-2008, he studied at Bogomolets National Medical University. In 2008-2010, internship at the Department of Otorhinolaryngology, at Bogomolets National Medical University. 2010-2012, residency at the Department of Otorhinolaryngology, at Bogomolets National Medical University. In 2016, he came into the focus of the world press (the Sun, Newsweek, New York Post, Daily Mail) thanks to the publication of a selfie from his surgery with a background of naked patients. In 2017, he founded the Ukrainian Medical Festival, an all-Ukrainian festival dedicated to the development and motivation of the young generation of physicians. In 2018, he founded KAMINSKYI HUB ─ a creative agency that specializes in providing comprehensive brand promotion services. In 2019, he founded the Kaminskyi Clinic. == Family == On July 16, 2014, Edgar Kaminsky married the soloist of the band NEANGELY, Slava Kaminska, who took his surname. On December 12, 2014, she gave birth to a son, Leonard, and on December 6, 2015, a daughter, Laura. On July 1, 2019, Slava and Edgar divorced. == References == == Other websites == * * * Edgar Kaminskyi on YouTube Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian scientists Category:Surgeons Category:Rivne Oblast
title: Edgar Kaminskyi
